circumstances: Louis Bartlett was reported missing after attending a family outing at a petting zoo. Accompanied by Hayley Booth, Louis wandered off, possibly entranced by the playful animals they had been observing together. Despite several calls and a search around the zoo premises, Louis was not immediately located, sparking concern among his companions and resulting in a low-level alert. After conducting an extensive search, police finally traced him to the vicinity of 30 Selvage Place, Rosyth. It was concluded that Louis, while potentially distracted by his surroundings, had inadvertently set out in the wrong direction, eventually finding himself disoriented. His time alone was thankfully brief and uneventful, leading to his safe return following confirmation of his identity by the authorities.
q_17_explanation: Louis was distracted at a family outing, unusual for his behavior.
q_20_explanation: He intended to enjoy the outing but wandered off while observing animals.
